mapper.select: select table_name name,table_comment `comment` from information_schema.tables where table_schema=#{libraryName}

select column_name as name, data_type as type, column_comment as `desc`, column_type as typeDetail, is_nullable as isNull, column_default as defaultVal from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{table} and table_schema=#{libraryName} order by ordinal_position asc
mapper.delete: delete from ${table} where deleted = 1 and update_time < #{updTime,jdbcType=DATE}
